name: tormath1 (@tormath1@fosstodon.org)
summary:
idea: replace the Advent of Code by a random issue from your favorite Open-Source project:


```
$ curl --silent https://api.github.com/repos/flatcar/flatcar/issues?per_page=100 | jq -r ' .[] | .html_url' | shuf | head -n 1
```

and contribute each day on a completely different topic: doc? Bug? Feature request?

Can't wait to see what I'm going to get the 1st of Dec.
